Title: Lay Down the Law
Plot: Niki's multi-million dollar action movie opens, but allegations about her sexuality lead Tina and her manager to suggest she take a date -- a male date -- to the premiere. Jenny is banned from the theater causing Adele to take the reins for the evening. Shane and Molly continue to play mind games with each other. Jodi throws a dinner party to some couples, and Bette is devastated to learn Tina and her date are also invited. Meanwhile, Tasha goes on trial and Alice delivers a shocking statement.
GuestStars: Kelly McGillis, Aaron Craven, Denalda Williams, Danielle Kremeniuk, Dominic Zamprogna, Tanya Champoux, Sean Bell, Aaron Pearl, Crystal Bubl√©, Conrad Whitaker, Andy Stahl, Chantal Jarry, Kaspar Michaels, Reese Alex
